title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Local Time of Day with Decimal Minute (Extended Format)
description: A representation of local time of day with decimal fraction of minute in extended format [hh][:][mm][,][n] or ["T"][hh][:][mm][.][n] where the time designator "T" may be omitted by mutual agreement and the decimal sign may be a comma or period (ยง5.3.1.4 d)
$comment: The decimal fraction must have at least one digit. The standard allows both comma and period as decimal signs
